snippet: O. J. Simpson was granted parole on several charges related to his role in the robbery of two sports memorabilia dealers, but he will remain in prison at least until 2017 on other charges.
abstract: O J Simpson is granted parole on charges related to his role in robbery of two sports memorabilia dealers at Las Vegas hotel, but he will remain in prison at least until 2017 on other charges.
lead_paragraph: O. J. Simpson was granted parole on several charges related to his role in the robbery of two sports memorabilia dealers, but he will remain in prison at least until 2017 on other charges.

headline.main: Nevada: Simpson Granted Parole on Some Charges in Robbery Case
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Simpson Granted Parole On Some Charges In Robbery Case
